description:
SQLite Expert is a powerful tool designed to simplify the development of SQLite3 databases.

SQLite Expert is a powerful tool designed to simplify the development of SQLite3 databases.

It is a feature rich administration and development tool for SQLite designed to answer the needs of all users from writing simple SQL queries to developing complex databases.

The graphical interface supports all SQLite features. It includes a visual query builder, an SQL editor with syntax highlighting and code completion, visual table and view designers and powerful import and export capabilities.

Free for personal and commercial use!
